<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Specialized Companion (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=538) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 176 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Incredible Companion (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=520)

</column>

---

Your animal companion has become cunning enough to become specialized. Your animal companion gains one [specialization](/animal-companions/specialized) of your choice.
name: Specialized Companion (Ranger)
